attributes.action: buy poppies from afghanistan not destroy them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: worldwide morphine shortage - problem with poppy growing in afganistan - we burn the fields. HELLLOOOO! has no-one thought that maybe we should set up an arrangement with the afgan government to buy the poppies? We get morphine, afgan farmers get cash, the drug barons are cut out in one fell swoop and the distribution of this stuff is controlled. Solves the morphine shortage (we could even earn some cash for the treasury), sorts out afgansitan and helps to squish the heroin problem across the world.
